00022 View::View(QDomNode &viewNode): nameGroup_(viewNode), envIdentifiers_(),
00023 language_(), languageStrict_(false), modelName_(),
00024 fileSetRefs_(), constraintSetRefs_(),
00025 parameters_(), hierarchyRef_(), defaultFileBuilders_(),
00026 topLevelViewRef_() {
00027 
00028         for (int i = 0; i < viewNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00029                 QDomNode tempNode = viewNode.childNodes().at(i);
00030 
00031                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:envIdentifier")) {
00032                         envIdentifiers_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00033                 }
00034 
00035                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:language")) {
00036                         language_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00037 
00038                         // get the spirit:strict attribute
00039                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00040                         QString strict = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:strict")).
00041                                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00042 
00043                         languageStrict_ = General::str2Bool(strict, false);
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:modelName")) {
00047                         modelName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileSetRef")) {
00051 
00052                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00053                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00054                                                 QString("spirit:localName")) {
00055 
00056                                         // strip the name of embedded whitespace characters
00057                                         QString localName = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).
00058                                                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00059                                         localName = General::removeWhiteSpace(localName);
00060                                         fileSetRefs_.append(localName);
00061                                 }
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:constraintSetRef")) {
00066                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00067                                 QString constraintSetRef = tempNode.childNodes().
00068                                                 at(j).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00069                                 constraintSetRef = General::removeWhiteSpace(constraintSetRef);
00070                                 constraintSetRefs_.append(constraintSetRef);
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00075 
00076                         // go through all parameters
00077                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00078                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00079                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00080                                                 new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:hierarchyRef")) {
00085                         hierarchyRef_ = General::createVLNV(tempNode, VLNV::DESIGN);
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:defaultFileBuilder")) {
00089                         defaultFileBuilders_.append(
00090                                 QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(new FileBuilder(tempNode)));
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:vendorExtensions")) {
00094                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00095                                 QDomNode extNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00096                                 if (extNode.nodeName() == QString("kactus2:topLevelViewRef"))
00097                                         topLevelViewRef_ = extNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 
00102         // if mandatory elements are missing
00103         if (nameGroup_.name_.isNull()) {
00104                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name is missing in "
00105                                 "spirit:view"));
00106         }
00107 
00108         if (envIdentifiers_.size() < 1) {
00109                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:envIdentifier"
00110                                 " is missing in spirit:view"));
00111         }
00112         return;
00113 }

00130 View::View( const View &other ):
00131 nameGroup_(other.nameGroup_),
00132 envIdentifiers_(other.envIdentifiers_),
00133 language_(other.language_),
00134 languageStrict_(other.languageStrict_),
00135 modelName_(other.modelName_),
00136 fileSetRefs_(other.fileSetRefs_),
00137 constraintSetRefs_(other.constraintSetRefs_),
00138 parameters_(),
00139 hierarchyRef_(other.hierarchyRef_),
00140 defaultFileBuilders_(),
00141 topLevelViewRef_(other.topLevelViewRef_) {
00142 
00143         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00144                 if (param) {
00145                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00146                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00147                         parameters_.append(copy);
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 
00151         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> builder, other.defaultFileBuilders_) {
00152                 if (builder) {
00153                         QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> copy = QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(
00154                                 new FileBuilder(*builder.data()));
00155                         defaultFileBuilders_.append(copy);
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 }

00160 View & View::operator=( const View &other ) {
00161         if (this != &other) {
00162                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00163                 envIdentifiers_ = other.envIdentifiers_;
00164                 language_ = other.language_;
00165                 languageStrict_ = other.languageStrict_;
00166                 modelName_ = other.modelName_;
00167                 fileSetRefs_ = other.fileSetRefs_;
00168                 constraintSetRefs_ = other.constraintSetRefs_;
00169                 hierarchyRef_ = other.hierarchyRef_;
00170                 topLevelViewRef_ = other.topLevelViewRef_;
00171 
00172                 parameters_.clear();
00173                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00174                         if (param) {
00175                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00176                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00177                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180 
00181                 defaultFileBuilders_.clear();
00182                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> builder, other.defaultFileBuilders_) {
00183                         if (builder) {
00184                                 QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> copy = QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(
00185                                         new FileBuilder(*builder.data()));
00186                                 defaultFileBuilders_.append(copy);
00187                         }
00188                 }
00189         }
00190         return *this;
00191 }

00197 void View::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00198         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:view");
00199 
00200         // mandatory name must be found
00201         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00202                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("mandatory name missing in spirit:view"));
00203         }
00204         else {
00205                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", nameGroup_.name_);
00206         }
00207         
00208         // if display name is defined
00209         if (!nameGroup_.displayName_.isEmpty())
00210                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", nameGroup_.displayName_);
00211 
00212         // if description is defined
00213         if (!nameGroup_.description_.isEmpty())
00214                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", nameGroup_.description_);
00215 
00216         // write all spirit:envIdentifier elements
00217         for (int i = 0; i < envIdentifiers_.size(); ++i) {
00218                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:envIdentifier", envIdentifiers_.at(i));
00219         }
00220 
00221         // write spirit:hierarchyRef if one exists
00222         if (hierarchyRef_.isValid()) {
00223                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:hierarchyRef");
00224                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &hierarchyRef_);
00225         }
00226 
00227         // if optional spirit:language is defined
00228         if (!language_.isEmpty()) {
00229                 // start the spirit:language tag
00230                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:language");
00231 
00232                 // write the attribute for the element
00233                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:strict",
00234                                 General::bool2Str(languageStrict_));
00235 
00236                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00237                 writer.writeCharacters(language_);
00238                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:language
00239         }
00240 
00241         // if optional spirit:modelName is defined
00242         if (!modelName_.isEmpty()) {
00243                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:modelName", modelName_);
00244         }
00245 
00246         // tell each defaultFileBuilder to write itself
00247         for (int i = 0; i < defaultFileBuilders_.size(); ++i) {
00248                 defaultFileBuilders_.at(i)->write(writer);
00249         }
00250 
00251         // write all fileSetRefs
00252         for (int i = 0; i < fileSetRefs_.size(); ++i) {
00253                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:fileSetRef");
00254                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:localName", fileSetRefs_.at(i));
00255                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:fileSetRef
00256         }
00257 
00258         // write all constraintSetRefs
00259         for (int i = 0; i < constraintSetRefs_.size(); ++i) {
00260                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:constraintSetRef",
00261                                 constraintSetRefs_.at(i));
00262         }
00263 
00264         // write all the parameters
00265         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00266                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00267 
00268                 // go through each parameter
00269                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00270                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00271                 }
00272 
00273                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00274         }
00275 
00276         // if a vendor extension is defined
00277         if (!topLevelViewRef_.isEmpty()) {
00278                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00279                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:topLevelViewRef",
00280                         topLevelViewRef_);
00281                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:vendorExtensions
00282         }
00283 
00284         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:view
00285 }

00340 void View::setHierarchyRef(const VLNV& hierarchyRef) {
00341 
00342         hierarchyRef_ = hierarchyRef;
00343 
00344         // if view is hierarchical then it can't have these elements.
00345         language_.clear();
00346         languageStrict_ = false;
00347         modelName_.clear();
00348         fileSetRefs_.clear();
00349         constraintSetRefs_.clear();
00350         parameters_.clear();
00351 }

00387 void View::addFileSetRef(const QString fileSetRef) {
00388 
00389         // the there already exists a reference to that file set
00390         if (fileSetRefs_.contains(fileSetRef)) {
00391                 // don't add reference to same file set twice
00392                 return;
00393         }
00394 
00395         // add a reference to a file set
00396         fileSetRefs_.append(fileSetRef);
00397 
00398         hierarchyRef_.clear();
00399         topLevelViewRef_.clear();
00400 }
